text: Ferreirana is a genus of leaf beetles in the subfamily Eumolpinae. It is known from Africa. ==Species== * Ferreirana dejeani (Lefèvre, 1877) * Ferreirana donckieri (Pic, 1942) * Ferreirana foveata (Jacoby, 1897) ==References== Category:Eumolpinae Category:Chrysomelidae genera Category:Beetles of Africa
title: Ferreirana
